    • resize

      public void resize(int width, int height)
      Description copied from interface: ApplicationListener
      Called when the Application is resized. This can happen at any point during a non-paused state but will never happen before a call to ApplicationListener.init().
      Specified by:
      resize in interface ApplicationListener
      Parameters:
      width - the new width in pixels
      height - the new height in pixels
